name: GemQuizGemWhoAMI
0:
”Alexa, open gem quiz”
”Alexa, start gem quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gem quiz
des:
Ask Alexa to open Gem Quiz
She will ask how many players and explain how to play the game (up to four players)
The game is like a gem who am I? She will provide hints about a gem. She will not give you possible answers, so some knowledge of common gemstones is required. She will then tell you the name of the gem. The more you play the more you learn about gems, mystical and metaphysical properties, and lore!
Charmed in Company LLP is the oldest mystical metaphysical shoppe in NJ. We created this skill as a way to provide fun lore and knowledge about gemstones in a different format. Check out our other skills in the lifestyle, self improvement section.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
